name: title_language
description: Language of title, as detected by pycld2

name: abstract_language
description: Language of abstract, as detected by pycld2

name: is_ai
description: True if a CSET classifier predicted this work was relevant to Artificial Intelligence, False if the classifier predicted that this work was not relevant to AI, and null if the classifier was not run on this work (i.e. if the work had a non-English or null title and abstract).

name: is_nlp
description: True if a CSET classifier predicted this work was relevant to Natural Language Processing, False if the classifier predicted that this work was not relevant to AI, and null if the classifier was not run on this work (i.e. if the work had a non-English or null title and abstract).

name: is_cv
description: True if a CSET classifier predicted this work was relevant to Computer Vision, False if the classifier predicted that this work was not relevant to AI, and null if the classifier was not run on this work (i.e. if the work had a non-English or null title and abstract).

name: is_robotics
description: True if a CSET classifier predicted this work was relevant to AI, False if the classifier predicted that this work was not relevant to Robotics, and null if the classifier was not run on this work (i.e. if the work had a non-English or null title and abstract).
